BITD.equipment_common_a_blade_or_two_des: Perhaps you carry a simple fighting knife. Or two curved swords. Or a rapier and stiletto. Or a heavy butcher’s cleaver.
BITD.equipment_common_a_large_weapon_des: A weapon meant for two hands. A battle-axe, greatsword, warhammer, or pole-arm. A hunting rifle. A blunderbuss. A bow or crossbow.
BITD.equipment_common_a_pistol_descripti: A heavy, single-shot, breechloading firearm. Devastating at 20 paces, slow to reload.
BITD.equipment_common_an_unusual_weapon_: A curiosity or tool turned into a weapon. A whip, a flail, a hatchet, a shovel, a length of chain, a razor-edged fan, steel-toed boots.
BITD.equipment_common_arcane_implements_: A vial of quicksilver. A pouch of black salt. A spirit anchor in the form of a small stone. A spirit bottle. A vial of electroplasm, designed to break and splatter on impact.
BITD.equipment_common_armor_description: A thick leather tunic plus reinforced gloves and boots.
BITD.equipment_common_burglary_gear_desc: A set of lockpicks. A small pry-bar. Vials of oil to silence squeaky hinges. A coil of wire and fishing hooks. A small pouch of fine sand.
BITD.equipment_common_climbing_gear_desc: A large coil of rope. A small coil of rope. Grappling hooks. A small pouch of chalk dust. A climbing harness with loops and metal rings. A set of iron pitons and a small mallet.
BITD.equipment_common_demolition_tools_d: A sledgehammer and iron spikes. Heavy drill. Crowbar.
BITD.equipment_common_documents_descript: A collection of slim volumes on a variety of topics, including a registry of the nobility, City Watch commanders, and other notable citizens. Blank pages, a vial of ink, a pen. A number of interesting maps.
BITD.equipment_common_heavy_description: The addition of chain mail, metal plates, a metal helm.
BITD.equipment_common_lantern_descriptio: A simple oil lantern, a fancy electroplasmic lamp, or other light source.
BITD.equipment_common_spiritbane_charm_d: A small arcane trinket that ghosts prefer to avoid.
BITD.equipment_common_subterfuge_supplie: A theatrical makeup kit. A selection of blank documents, ready for the forger’s hand. Costume jewelry. A reversible cloak and distinctive hat. A forged badge of office.
BITD.equipment_common_tinkering_tools_de: An assortment for detailed mechanist work: jeweler’s loupe, tweezers, a small hammer, pliers, screwdriver, etc.
